   20: %%
   21: 
   22: %%
   23: %% ct:run("../inets_test", uri_SUITE).
   24: %%
   25: 
   26: -module(uri_SUITE).
   27: 
   28: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
   29: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   30: -include("inets_test_lib.hrl").
   31: 
   32: %% Note: This directive should only be used in test suites.
   33: -compile(export_all).
   34: 
   35: -define(GOOGLE, "www.google.com").
   36: 
   37: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   38: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   39: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   40: suite() ->
   41:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   42: 
   43: all() ->
   44:     [encode_decode].
   45: 
   46: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   47: 
   48: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   49:     Config.
   50: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   51:     ok.
   52: 
   53: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   54: 
   55: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   56:     Config.
   57: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   58:     ok.
   59: 
   60: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
   61: %% Test cases starts here.
   62: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
   63: 
   64: 
   65: encode_decode(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   66:     ?assertEqual("foo%20bar", http_uri:encode("foo bar")),
   67:     ?assertEqual(<<"foo%20bar">>, http_uri:encode(<<"foo bar">>)),
   68: 
   69:     ?assertEqual("foo+bar", http_uri:decode("foo+bar")),
   70:     ?assertEqual(<<"foo+bar">>, http_uri:decode(<<"foo+bar">>)),
   71:     ?assertEqual("foo bar", http_uri:decode("foo%20bar")),
   72:     ?assertEqual(<<"foo bar">>, http_uri:decode(<<"foo%20bar">>)),
   73:     ?assertEqual("foo\r\n", http_uri:decode("foo%0D%0A")),
   74:     ?assertEqual(<<"foo\r\n">>, http_uri:decode(<<"foo%0D%0A">>)).
